text: Richard Andrew Palethorpe-Todd (11 June 19193 December 2009) was an Irish- British actor. He won a Golden Globe Award and had an Academy Award for Best Actor nomination for his role as Corporal Lachlan MacLachlan in the 1949 movie The Hasty Heart. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:Actors from Dublin Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Richard Todd
